description: Removes a locale from a bot. When you delete a locale, all intents, slots, and slot types defined for the locale are also deleted.

parameters.name: botId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the bot that contains the locale.

parameters.name: botVersion
parameters.description: The version of the bot that contains the locale.

parameters.name: localeId
parameters.description: The identifier of the language and locale that will be deleted. The string must match one of the supported locales. For more information, see Supported languages.

nested_items.name: botId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the bot that contained the deleted locale.

nested_items.name: botVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the bot that contained the deleted locale.

nested_items.name: localeId
nested_items.description: The language and locale of the deleted locale.

nested_items.name: botLocaleStatus
nested_items.description: The status of deleting the bot locale. The locale first enters the Deleting status. Once the locale is deleted it no longer appears in the list of locales for the bot.
